Mount Panorama Will Dale & Matthew Taylor FOX SPORTS Bathurst
title: Lowndes wins sixth Bathurst 1000
text:
Bathurst 1000: Live coverage of V8 Supercars Race 25 from Mount Panorama Will Dale & Matthew Taylor FOX SPORTS Bathurst 1000: Live coverage of V8 Supercars Race 25 from Mount Panorama Will Dale & Matthew Taylor FOX SPORTS Bathurst laps 1-65 recap 1:41 
Bathurst 1000: Hghlights of laps 1-65. October 11th 2015 3 hours ago /video/video.news.com.au/Sport/Motor Sport/V8/ 
RAIN is threatening to return as the Bathurst 1000 heads into the closing stages with David Reynolds in the lead. 
The track has dried out since the initial mid-race cloudburst, with Reynolds leading teammate Mark Winterbottom from Red Bull stablemates Craig Lowndes and Jamie Whincup with one round of pit stops to go. 
Whincup was dominating most of the race until he was struck by electrical gremlins, losing over 20 seconds in a pit stop while they tried to be rectified. 
Crashes have put the Super Black Racing car of Andre Heimgartner/Ant Pedersen out of the race and destroyed the chances of former race winner Nick Percat/Oliver Gavin. 
After their earlier spill, the Harvey Norman Supergirls entry is repaired and back out on track with Simona de Silvestro at the wheel, but they are 37 laps behind. 
HOW TO WATCH THE BATHURST 1000: Other Stories
